ygData.subject: Languages???
ygData.msgSnippet: I am wanting to gain knowledge in languages but I have a few questions. As of know I only have access to Common and Edudian. #1.  How do I get access to other
ygData.messageBody:
I am wanting to gain knowledge in languages but I have a few questions.

As of know I only have access to Common and Edudian.

#1. How do I get access to other languages. Do they just appear after you lvl. or do you have to talk to a person first who speaks that language before you get it.

#2. Someone posted they had 10 languages. How? I can't foe the life of me get another language to show up when I go to the trainer.

#3. I know combine is the language of the giants, ut what language is the Tier' dal or whatever it is.

Thanks for any info,

Sinth
